text: @realDonaldTrump You should’ve taken the Coronavirus serious in Early January!!! We are sick of your stupid excuse about stopping international flying from China, but we all know that was AFTER what you called Coronavirus a “HOAX”... We know better! Now get the hell off Twitter and do your job!
